emails.subject: URGENT: Missing Document in eTMF for Study DNLI-CNS-002 - IRB Approval
emails.body:
Hi Alex,

Hope you are well.

During a routine QC of the Trial Master File for study DNLI-CNS-002, I was unable to locate the IRB approval letter for the recently submitted Protocol Amendment 4 (dated 2023-10-15) for our central site, Summit Neurosciences (Site 101).

Could you please investigate this? If you have the document, please upload it to the correct placeholder in the eTMF as soon as possible. If the site has not yet provided it, could you follow up with them?

This is currently holding up our periodic TMF review milestone.

Thanks for your help.

Best regards,

Sarah Chen
TMF Specialist
Denali Therapeutics
sarah.chen@denalitx.com

role_descriptions: alex.johnson@denalitx.com: Denali Therapeutics (Sponsor), Clinical Research Associate
david.lee@denalitx.com: Denali Therapeutics (Sponsor), Clinical Project Manager
description: A request from Denali's internal TMF specialist to Alex Johnson asking for the IRB approval letter for a recently submitted protocol amendment from a central site. Alex needs to locate the document and ensure it is uploaded to the eTMF system correctly.
